unnormalised: Hey, loving these athlete bios! Really inspiring to read about folks like Mithali Raj and her journey. Remember "Chak De! India"? Always gives me goosebumps. Wonder if there'll be a biopic about PV Sindhu someday. Also, curious about athletes from smaller towns, maybe some from IIT Madras' sports teams?
